name.ja: セレブレード・デスワイルド

requirement.en: Equip this card to 1 face-up LIGHT Attribute Spellcaster Type monster on your field.

effect.en: The equipped monster gains 400 ATK, and if it attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage (if the ATK of the attacking monster exceeds the DEF of the attack target, inflict the difference). If you use the equipped monster as material for a Fusion Summon while you have "Celeb Rose Witch" in your Graveyard, its name can be treated as "Celeb Rose Witch".
